LanguageData.SSGPSBeaconFood.label: GPS Beacon (Food)
LanguageData.SSGPSBeaconFood.description: A GPS beacon for food supplies. A one-time use component, that sends a radio burst signal to request supplies to a specific location.
LanguageData.SSFoodSupplyFlare.label: Food Supply Flare
LanguageData.SSFoodSupplyFlare.description: Single use launcher that applies marker gas to call in food supplies.
LanguageData.SSFoodSupplyFlare.verbs.0.label: Food supply marker flare
LanguageData.Grenade_SSFoodSupplyFlare.label: Food supply flare marker
LanguageData.Gas_SSFoodFlareMark.label: Food Supply Marker Gas
